name: Leanne Graham
review: Alex is a great guy. And I must say he has some good knowladge about history of Indonesia. I will be with him again for sure!

name: Ervin Howell
review: Last Month I visited Indonesia for a trip, and I found Alex. Thanks for every effort you gave.10/10 would recommend!

name: Deckow Crist
review: I will recomended him as a tour guide not only because he knows his country very well also for his friendly behiviour!
